MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L36 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Paxton Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  11:27pm Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working onsite with Cadent gas Services. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.30AM via generators. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.49AM on 17th December 2020.
